channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 10/14/2023 INC#1037

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1037; 04:13PM; 4762 E Charters Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RXKSVo; #HighlandPark; *Corrected Address* Crews found a well-developed fire inside of the unoccupied home (under construction). Firefighters established hose lines inside to fight fire burning in the attached converted garage, attic, and living space of the home. These efforts were coordinated with firefighters above performing rooftop ventilation. Ultimately, it took 46 firefighters 44 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM40 CM42 E12 E201 E202 E203 E212 E220 E27 E35 E44 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 RA2 RA803 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T1 T12 T2 T20 T3 UR27 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1037; 03:29PM; 4766 E Charters Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RXKSVo; #HighlandPark; Two-story home under construction with fire showing from the second floor. Offensive mode.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 CM40 CM42 E12 E201 E212 E220 E44 E55 RA12 RA2 T1 T12 T20; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Cliff Rescue; INC#1264; 05:40PM; 8100 W Skyline Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/46u6qxu; #BeverlyCrest; Due to the steep terrain and location of the crash, Firefighters opted for a hoist to rescue the occupant of the vehicle. One approximately 27-year-old male was hoisted and transported by air to a local trauma center in critical condition. LAPD Inc #3100. Nothing further.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC14 BC18 BC5 E227 E27 E278 E88 E97 EM14 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 HR3 RA827 RA97 RH114 T27 T78 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Cliff Rescue; INC#1264; 04:55PM; 8100 W Skyline Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/46u6qxu; #BeverlyCrest; One vehicle went hundreds of feet over the side of the road, near Mulholland Drive & Skyline Drive. LAFD Air Operations lowered a Firefighter-Paramedic down to the location where the vehicle came to rest, in order to initiate patient care.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC14 BC18 BC5 E227 E27 E278 E88 E97 EM14 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 HR3 RA827 RA97 RH114 T27 T78 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Confined Space Rescue; INC#0688; 11:23AM; 222 N Hill St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48NGJJR; #DowntownLA; A man fell down a shaft approximately 30 feet down (air vent?) and became trapped. LAFD Firefighters responded and, due to the depth and (narrow) width of the space, realized that ladders, or putting a rescuer (second person) in the shaft, were not the best options. Crews lowered a harness and rope down to the man and successfully (and quickly) raised him out of the shaft. Thankfully, he was awake and alert, with no obvious injuries. Paramedics performed an assessment and will transport him to a local hospital for further evaluation, due to the long distance of the fall. Nothing further.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E203 E3 E4 E9 EM1 FR201 HR3 RA11 RA17 RA809 SQ21 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0082; 02:03AM; 3504 S 5th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48HzAuq; #JeffersonPark; Fire was consuming one room in the rear corner, with some attic involvement. It took 40 firefighters 16 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E294 E34 E66 E94 EM11 RA34 RA834 T15 T26 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E294 E34 E66 E94 EM11 RA34 RA834 T15 T26 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0061; 01:22AM; 1342 N Fairfax Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rGlN6X; #Hollywood; Two story vacant house with fire showing. It took 30 firefighters 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 RA27 RA41 T27 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1762; 10:31PM; NB 5 Fwy x EB 210 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rQwS5l; #Sylmar; LAFD (32 FF) and LA County FD made quick work of the brush fire, surrounding the small burn area with hose, and dousing it with water. Crews held the burn to *less than* a tenth of an acre, achieving a knockdown of the flames in 41 minutes from the time of alarm. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 T75 T90 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1762; 09:50PM; NB 5 Fwy x EB 210 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rQwS5l; #Sylmar; Approximately 50' x 75' area of brush on fire, with no wind and no structures threatened. LA County FD responding in mutual aid, and CHP assisting with lane closures on the freeway.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 T75 T90 T98; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange
